tags: i get there's a chance that i need a hero is just being in the trailers and not specifically in the movie itself
but i have a hard time believe it won't be in the movie considering how many trailers the song has been in so far
and yes this goes for the sonic movie and gangster's paradise too.
summary: Am I the only not really enthusiastic about hearing non-game related music in video game movies? Not just because some music...
body:
Am I the only not really enthusiastic about hearing non-game related music in video game movies? Not just because some music seems really out of place for some of them, but also just like. There’s a plethora of great music to be remixed for these films that’re just going unused, when it’s liiikely cheaper and easier to get allowance to remix those songs than it is to get the licensing and pay for the rights to use music not from those franchises. 

Like, I love “I Need a Hero”, but I would really honestly prefer hearing actual remixed Pokemon music than that in Detective Pikachu.

title: Detective Picachu: Nuevo poster
body:
Detective Picachu: Nuevo poster

Una de las cintas esperadas del año es Detective Picachu, donde un mundo alternativo al de la serie original, se desarrolla entre Pokemones y seres humanos, y aunque no siempre son los mejores, los pósters chinos de las películas de Hollywood suelen ser más espectaculares que los que vemos en Estados Unidos y Europa. Lo hemos comprobado recientemente con ‘Vengadores: Endgame‘ y ‘Animales…

summary: Pokemon Detective Pikachu toys available in Burger King - we've got them too! - OtakuGuru - Pokemon, Anime and Manga, Games,...
title: Pokemon Detective Pikachu toys available in Burger King - we've got them too! - OtakuGuru - Pokemon, Anime and Manga, Games, Reviews, Nintendo
excerpt: Few days ago we learned that Pokemon toys from Detective Pikachu will come to Burger King. Once again after many years we will get a chance to get some toys from Burger King, instead of McDonalds. But you know what? I decide to check this and looks like this promotion started in UK.
description: So after Mexico and Spain we are not alone. At this moment there is not much details but few days ago first leaks start to appear across internet featuring photos from Twitter and Instagram. We had a sneak peak of few toys but wrapped in a foil bag. Also we found out that this promotion should start in April. From a Burger King where I got mine, I found that they had them for over a week and starts giving with Kids Meal. Still there is not much available like some promotional leaflet or other materials but this is live. So if you have Burger King close to you, go and check there. Also let me know if you were able to get some Detective Pikachu toys. Quickly, what we know at this moment: promotion should start in April, but looks like is live in some places earlier at this moment 5 toys been confirmed: Detective Pikachu, Psyduck, Arcanine, Mewtwo, Loudred and Bulbasaur promotion should be available at the same time for every region USA, UK etc [but this isn’t confirmed] Now is the best part. I was able to grab few of them from one Burger King available in Bristol, UK I’ve got: Detective Pikachu, Mewtwo and Arcanine This toys looks really good. I’m surprised how Pikachu is well made. Also our electric friend carry secret technique 😉 All toys I got, have some technique. They can shoot, light etc. If you’d like to check some of my photos with this toys. Please look below for everything I posted on Twitter and Instagram. Also there is video opening, where I’m opening and displaying this toys. * This post should be update soon with any additional details about this promotion. I’ll try to get as much info I can.

tags: this is either going to be amazing or terrible
or terribly amazing or amazingly terrible
summary: just saw the full detective pikachu trailer for the first time because i caved and like. what the actual fuck first off:...
body:
just saw the full detective pikachu trailer for the first time because i caved and like. what the actual fuck

first off: live-action pokemon. what the fuck. the special effects budget makes me cringe.

second: jigglypuff looks ready to throw down and murder someone. ludicolo looks like it crawled straight out of a survival-horror game. morelull are super pretty. aipom is genuinely horrifying. charizard looks AMAZING.

third: ryan reynolds? as pikachu?? deadpool’s soul just astral-projected straight  into the biggest pokemon icon. whyyy

fourth: why is the music for this ‘holding out for a hero.’ what the fuck is this movie

fourth: why is the music for this ‘holding out for a hero.’ what the fuck is this movie

summary: Tim uses miming to try to get Mr. Mime to give up his information, pouring “fake gasoline” on him and threatening to light him...
text: Tim uses miming to try to get Mr. Mime to give up his information, pouring “fake gasoline” on him and threatening to light him on fire. Things only get darker from there as Tim and Detective Pikachu mime locking Mr. Mime in an invisible box and locking the door. But it works — Mr. Mime gives up the goods

summary: Hot Take: Pokémon designs can be realistic without looking uncanny valley or grim! // Just a quick 15min edit to show what I...
caption:
Hot Take: Pokémon designs can be realistic without looking uncanny valley or grim! // Just a quick 15min edit to show what I mean :>

(It’s eventually down to preference, but I’d personally love the Pokémon to be closer to their original designs)

reblog.comment:

blog.name: jadeazora
blog.title: Let's have a little fun, shall we?
blog.description: Call me Harlan | Anime, games (most often Pokemon since that's my main fandom), cartoons | Will take gif requests | Also does art sometimes

summary:
“I heard rumors about Pokemon attacking people.”
-----
“Just doing some light stretching. I’m about to rock this...
body:
“I heard rumors about Pokemon attacking people.”
—–
“Just doing some light stretching. I’m about to rock this place.”

“Pikachu, RUN!!!!”
“Oh my god! Oh!”

“Brilliant idea. You hold the door! I’ll go get help!”
“What?!”

“Is this really happening?”

“Don’t worry. None of this is real.”
*tree crashes behind him*
“Nope! All of this is real! Run!”

“….Hey, Tim? I don’t float….”
*cue Hydro Pump*

*tree crashes behind him*
“Nope! All of this is real! Run!”

“….Hey, Tim? I don’t float….”
*cue Hydro Pump*
trail.content:
“I heard rumors about Pokemon attacking people.”
—–
“Just doing some light stretching. I’m about to rock this place.”

“Pikachu, RUN!!!!”
“Oh my god! Oh!”

“Brilliant idea. You hold the door! I’ll go get help!”
“What?!”

“Is this really happening?”

“Don’t worry. None of this is real.”
*tree crashes behind him*
“Nope! All of this is real! Run!”

“….Hey, Tim? I don’t float….”
*cue Hydro Pump*
